get.description: Retrieve contacts from the Alliant Middleware (wrapping BenefitPoint). Contacts can be plan-specific, carrier-specific, or employer-specific.

parameters.name: planId
parameters.description: The unique Id referencing a plan.

parameters.name: carrierId
parameters.description: The unique Id referencing a carrier.

parameters.name: employerKey
parameters.description: The unique Id referencing an employer.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: A free text tag for finding matching contacts. Where multiple tags are specified, return most relevant contacts first.

200.description: Returns an array of Contacts. Note if more than one parameter is provided of (planId, carrierId, employerKey), list will contain the union of all filters.

400.description: Bad request. This is returned if one of the parameters is not valid

get.description: Retrieve employer information given an employer key.

parameters.name: employerKey
parameters.description: The unique key referencing an employer account. This key is manually distributed by employers to employees.

200.description: Valid employer, returns basic employer information.

get.description: Retrieve all lines of business this employer offers

parameters.name: employerKey
parameters.description: The unique key identifying an employer.

200.description: An array of all lines of business that an employer offers

get.description: Retrieve all benefit plans this employer offers. Plans are categorized by line of business.

parameters.name: employerKey
parameters.description: The unique key identifying an employer.

200.description: A hierarchy of all plans that an employer offers

sessionToken.name: authorization
sessionToken.description:
sessionToken is retrieved from `POST /login`, and it should
be used for authorized access to all the subsequent requests to 
private apis.

planTabKey.description: The index number of the tab of the plan Selector where this plan should appear.

planTabDesc.description: The name of the tab where this plan will appear.

displaySort.description: A numerical value that specifies the order in which this plan should appear within its LOB.

planCategory.description: The category of plan. This applies only to medical plans and can be one of (Core, Pharmacy, Spending).

planType.description: The type of plan. This applies only to medical and spending plans and can be one of (PPO, HMO, HDHP, HSA, FSA)

carrierId.description: The unique identifier for a Carrier.

isDefault.description: Indicates if this is default coverage where no election is required.

groupNumber.description: The policy / group number for this plan

nameCopy.description: The name of the network (ex. In-Network, Level 1, Colorado)
The name of the group (ex. Annual Deductible, Office Visits)

keyCopy.description: The name of the attribute (ex. Invidual)

planSelectionVariable.description: Indicates if variable is an individual or family deductible or out of pocket maximum (for plan selection), and if so, which one it is.

lineOfBusinessSort.description: A numerical value that specifies the order in which this LOB should appear.

enum: FEE FOR SERVICE - INTERNATIONAL BENEFITS CONSULTING
